hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT TOP (1) rowNumberAlias FROM( SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY q_.defaultHeadwordAlias) AS rowNumberAlias FROM( SELECT DISTINCT bookAlias.Id AS bookIdAlias , bookheadwo2_.DefaultHeadword AS defaultHeadwordAlias , bookheadwo2_.XmlEntryId AS xmlEntryIdAlias FROM Book bookAlias INNER JOIN BookVersion bookversio1_ ON bookAlias.LastVersion = bookversio1_.Id INNER JOIN BookHeadword bookheadwo2_ ON bookversio1_.Id = bookheadwo2_.BookVersion WHERE bookAlias.Id IN( :bookIds ) ) AS q_ ) AS query WHERE query.xmlEntryIdAlias = :xmlEntryId ORDER BY query.rowNumberAlias;
